mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( member_id, board_no, comment_content, comment_date ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{boardNo}, #{commentContent}, Now() )
mapper.select: SELECT comment_no commentNo, member_id memberId, board_no boardNo, comment_content commentContent, comment_date commentDate From comment WHERE comment_no =#{commentNo}
SELECT comment_no commentNo, member_id memberId, board_no boardNo, comment_content commentContent, comment_date commentDate From comment WHERE board_no=#{boardNo} limit #{startRow},#{rowPerPage}
